info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 6 at 9:55PM EDT until May 12 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Ohio... Indiana...
Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Adams, Van Wert and Allen IN Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Ohio...
Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Defiance, Williams and Fulton OH Counties.
For the Saint Marys River...including Decatur, St. Mary's River near Fort Wayne...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Tiffin River...including Stryker...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker.
* WHEN...Until Monday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Portions of State Route 66 flood north of Archbold.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EDT Tuesday was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 11.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall early Thursday afternoon. It will rise to 12.2 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 400 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Defiance, OH; Fulton, OH; Williams, OH
